named-query.name: findSeriesByName
named-query.query: select s from SeriesEntity s where lower(s.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: getSeriesSetsCountByIds
named-query.query: select new Map(s.id as id, (select count(1) from SetEntity se where se.series.id = s.id) as cnt) from SeriesEntity s where s.id in (:ids)

named-query.name: getAllSeries
named-query.query: select s from SeriesEntity s order by s.name

named-query.name: findSetByNumber
named-query.query: select s from SetEntity s where lower(s.number) = lower(:number)

named-query.name: getSetCountBySeries
named-query.query: select count(1) from SetEntity s where s.series.id = :seriesId

named-query.name: findColorByName
named-query.query: select c from ColorEntity c where lower(c.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: findPartCategoryByName
named-query.query: select p from PartCategoryEntity p where lower(p.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: getAllCategories
named-query.query: select p from PartCategoryEntity p order by p.name

named-query.name: findPartByNumber
named-query.query: select p from PartEntity p where lower(p.number) = lower(:number)

named-query.name: getPartCountByCategory
named-query.query: select count(1) from PartEntity p where p.category.id = :categoryId

named-query.name: getPartColorsCountByIds
named-query.query: select new Map(p.id as id, (select count(1) from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id = p.id) as cnt) from PartEntity p where p.id in (:ids)

named-query.name: getPartColorsByPartId
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id = :partId

named-query.name: getPartColorByNumber
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where lower(pc.number) = lower(:number)

named-query.name: getPartColorByPartAndColor
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id = :partId and pc.color.id = :colorId
